subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps won the 100-meter butterfly at the Indianapolis Grand Prix. He finished second in the 100 freestyle even though the winner, Nathan Adrian, split his trunks at the start.
snippet: Michael Phelps won the 100-meter butterfly at the Indianapolis Grand Prix. He finished second in the 100 freestyle even though the winner, Nathan Adrian, split his trunks at the start.
